MagneticReadoutProcessing.MRPHallbachArrayGenerator

class MRPHallbachArrayGenerator.MRPHallbachArrayGenerator

Contains static functions to generate a 3D CAD Model of a Hallbach-Magnet using given readings.

static generate_1k_hallbach_using_polarisation_direction(_readings: [<class 'MagneticReadoutProcessing.MRPReading.MRPReading'>], _slice_inner_diameter: float = 30, _slice_outer_diameter_safety_margin: float = 50)

Generates a Hallbach OpenSCAD file of a given list of readings using calculate_center_of_gravity algorithm to rotate the magnet into the right direction.

Parameters:

  • _readings (MRPReading.MRPReading) – a list of readings to generate a 1k hallbach array

  • _slice_inner_diameter (float) – hallbach ring inner diameter

  • _slice_outer_diameter (float) – hallbach ring outher diameter

static plot_vectors(_vectors: [<class 'vector._methods.Vector3D'>], _name: str = 'Vector Plot', _file: str | None = None)

Helperfunction to plot a list of 3D vectors using matplotlib

Parameters:

  • _vectors ([vector.Vector3D]) – reading

  • _name (str) – headline of the plot

  • _file (str) – if set, saves the plot as png to given path

exception MRPHallbachArrayGenerator.MRPHallbachArrayGeneratorException(message='MRPHallbachArrayGeneratorException thrown')
with_traceback()

Exception.with_traceback(tb) – set self.__traceback__ to tb and return self.
